properties.name: nameID
properties.description: Returns synthetic name of shape (sheet.ID). Locale independent.

properties.name: hyperlinks
properties.description: Returns the Hyperlinks collection for a Shape object.

properties.name: shapeRect
properties.description: Shape's BoundingBox (x,y coordinates) and width & Height

methods.name: addOverlay
methods.description: Adds an Overlay on top of the Shape
methods.syntax: shapeObject.addOverlay(OverlayID, OverlayType, Content, HorizontalPosition, VerticalPosition, OverlayWidth, OverlayHeight);
methods.signature: addOverlay(OverlayID: String, OverlayType: string, Content: String, HorizontalPosition: string, VerticalPosition: string, OverlayWidth: number, OverlayHeight: number)

parameters.name: OverlayID
parameters.description: A string that represents the identifier (ID) of the overlay

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: HTML or location of the Picture

parameters.name: HorizontalPosition
parameters.description: Alignment - Left, Center, Right. Default = Left

parameters.name: VerticalPosition
parameters.description: Alignment - Top, Middle, Bottom. Default = Top

parameters.name: OverlayWidth
parameters.description: A positive integer that specifies the width of the overlay, in pixels. Default = Shape's width

parameters.name: OverlayHeight
parameters.description: A positive integer that specifies the height of the overlay, in pixels. Default = Shape's height

methods.name: removeOverlay
methods.description: Removes particular Overlay or all Overlays on the Shape

parameters.name: OverlayID
parameters.description: A string that represents the identifier (ID) of the overlay. Default: Removes all overlays on the shape

methods.name: addHighlight
methods.description: Draws a rectangular highlight around the bounding box of the shape.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: A positive integer that specifies the width of the highlight's stroke in pixels.

parameters.name: Color
parameters.description: A string that specifies the color of the highlight. It must have the form "#RRGGBB", where each letter represents a hexadecimal digit between 0 and F, and where RR is the red value between 0 and 0xFF (255), GG the green value between 0 and 0xFF (255), and BB is the blue value between 0 and 0xFF (255).

methods.name: removeHighlight
methods.description: Removes the highlight from the shape, if one exists.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
